oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Allen, E. M., 1911 February 14
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of E. M. Allen, dated February 14th, 1911, written on letterhead of the National Casket Company, Nashville, Tenn. Illustrates the first page of the document. Allen’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on March 26th, 1917. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Allen family
